title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API with sync/async chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLM, chat, or embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with sync/async APIs, streaming, and model management utilities.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for the Ollama API—chat, generate, pull, list, delete, and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool for chatting with Ollama models, managing prompts, and saving conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama-powered code completion and inline chat into the editor.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot example using the Ollama JavaScript client and streaming responses.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-augmented generation demo using Ollama, ChromaDB, and LangChain to chat over local documents.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that forwards channel messages to a local Ollama model and posts replies back.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot using discord.py to chat with Ollama models in servers and threads.

title: ollama-nvidia-triton
summary: Example integration running Ollama models behind NVIDIA Triton Inference Server for enterprise scaling.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI for Ollama with model selector, token usage stats, and session memory.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama with generated types, streaming, and context cancellation.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, generate, embeddings, and model operations with async enumerables.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of custom Modelfiles and quantization recipes for community-tuned LLMs.
